hero.description: I am a Full Stack Developer with experience in building web applications using modern technologies. I am passionate about learning new technologies and improving my skills.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of my recent projects. Click on each project to see more details.
projects.interest: Are you interested in working with me? I can adapt to your needs and help you take your project to the next level.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description: Do you have a project in mind or just want to say hello? I would love to hear from you. Please fill out the form below and I will get in touch with you.
